page.title: 12SMALL HOLDING LOWER HEATH
page.content: At Mr and Mrs Silvesters they have 1 {bullock,2 calves and three cows.}They have between 10 and 20{chickens.}The chickens are fed on chicken meal which contains oyster shell,protein and other things. They have a few scraps of other food as well. Mr and Mrs Sil- vester also have{pigs,two gilts }(sows which haven't had piglets yet),1{boar 1-2{sows}and twelve{piglets.}One sow had 18{piglets}but six died. One{cow only is being milked at the moment,Mrs Silvester milks her by hand. They grow {vegetables}for eating them selves and selling .They also grow{flowers}which they sell.They also dry some of the flowers.Their daughter uses dry and fresh flowers to make{wedding bouquets Mr Silvester works fulltime at a{local {egg packing station}and Mrs Silvester works 20 hours each week{cleaning the {school.}They are very busy people.
